Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26253 affecting package glusterfs for versions less than 11.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-26253 affecting package glusterfs for versions less than 11.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glusterfs is earlier than 11.1-3, affected by CVE-2023-26253
